name: Dreamwalker: Arena
description:
Dreamwalker: Arena is a co-op 2v2 action game where you must team up against an enemy team and beat them in the arena! 

Players can choose to play as either the quick and versatile Dreamwalker or the strong and tank-like Guardian. Both players must work together as their abilites are intergral to the others survival in order to beat the enemy team. 

Note: 

The game requires you to play with 4 controllers (one for each player) and does not support keyboard and mouse.
